title: [2J[H[01;36m ============= Welcome to Hangman =============[0m
opening:
Welcome to the game of Hangman on command line!
This implementation allows multiple players to
play different versions of the game, which are:

 [01;36ma.[0m Round-robin writer, rotating the player who
    writes the guessword after each turn;

 [01;36mb.[0m King of the hill, where the first to guess
    the word correctly becomes the writer;

 [01;36mc.[0m Wordlist, where there is no writer and the
    guessword is taken from a wordlist instead;

 [01;36md.[0m Time attack wordlist, the fastest of the
    gamemodes, in which there are no turns and
    guesses be given very quickly.

You can [01;36mquit[0m at any moment with [01;36m^C[0m (Ctrl-C).
